nodes.text: Limmie, also known as bolo-ball, was a sport played in the galaxy that was known for being less combat-oriented than others. It was played by residents of a colony on Sedri Minor during the High Republic Era. The Rodian Julus was teaching his human friend Bartol how to play the game before he was abducted by the Drengir, and considered Bartol to be good at it. When Bartol and Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis later found Julus' corpse underground, Bartol told Trennis about how they had played bolo-ball.
